name: THE INFECTED PROJECT
description:
(Early Access) The Infected has outnumbered the living. Only a few humans are there to stop them, can you handle it? Fight against the undead as you try to cleanse the world, and restore it back to the living.

CHARACTER BACKSTORY:

At age 18, after leaving school, Michael immediately joined the army. Throughout the next 10 years Michael was promoted to Lieutenant, here he trained in specialist skills, including advanced gun handling and ghost operations. In June 2021, Michaels army best friend, David “Sticks” Oakman and the rest of Michaels small quad was seriously injured/ died while out patrolling, David stepped on an IED. This patrol was covert, no one else knew they was there. Dazed and confused, Michael return back to base, he was greeted by his superior and a couple of army police. They accused him of betraying his fellow Officers, and conspiring with the enemy. He was put on house arrest unable to go out, in the next few months things began to change, he would see less people outside, the power would keep turning off and on again. Then one day while shooting in his firing range in his garden, he heard something, something that would change his life from now on.

CORE FEATURES: 

  1. 2D Top Down Gameplay
  2. Shooting
  3. Exploration

CONTROLS:

  • W - Move Forward
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Move Down
  • D - Move Right
  • LMB - Fire the current weapon 
  • Cursor - Aim 
  • 1 - Weapon 1
  • 2 - Weapon 2 (if collected)
  • 3 - Weapon 3 (if collected)
  • 4 - Weapon 4 (if collected)
